mapper.select:
/*getDailyCheckBoardList*/
SELECT DAILY_MAIN_ID AS dailyMainId ,DAILY_MAIN_BOARDID AS dailyMainBoardId ,DAILY_MAIN_CD AS dailyMainCd ,DAILY_MAIN_CDNM AS dailyMainCdNm ,DAILY_MAIN_CONTENT AS dailyMainContent ,DAILY_MAIN_WRITER AS dailyMainWriter ,DAILY_MAIN_WRITERNO AS dailyMainWriterNo ,DAILY_MAIN_VIEWCNT AS dailyMainViewCnt ,DAILY_MAIN_CREATEDATE AS dailyMainCreateDate ,DAILY_MAIN_MODDATE AS dailyMainModDate FROM MAIN_DAILY_BOARD
